<input type="button" value="Delete" ng-click="remove{{domainName}}({{domainNameInSmallLetter}}._id)"/>

    <tr>
        <td>Username</td>
        <td><input type="text" ng-model="{{domainNameInSmallLetter}}.username"/></td>
    </tr>

        <td>Password</td>
        <td><input type="password" ng-model="{{domainNameInSmallLetter}}.password"/></td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
        <td><input type="button" value="Reset" ng-click="reset()"  /></td>
        <td><input type="button" value="Update" ng-click="update{{domainName}}()" /></td>
    </tr>
